fixes.name: Term Label CAD Formatting
fixes.dax_expression:
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "3 Month" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "3M Cash" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "BAX2" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "BAX1" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "BAX3", 1,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "BAX5" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "BAX4" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "BAX6", 2,
    'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "BAX9" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "BAX10" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "BAX7" || 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL] = "BAX8", 3,
    4
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level IF/ELSEIF string comparisons into a calculated column using SWITCH(TRUE()). All column references were rewritten to the 'Table'[Column] format and string literals kept in double quotes.
